products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: Weighing in under 7 pounds, the Kilburn is a lightweight piece of vintage styled engineering. Setting the bar as one of the loudest speakers in its class, the Kilburn is a compact, stout-hearted hero with a well-balanced audio which boasts a clear midrange and extended highs for a sound that is both articulate and pronounced. The analogue knobs allow you to fine tune the controls to your personal preferences while the guitar-influenced leather strap enables easy and stylish travel.

products.name: Smartphone Stand
products.description: This adjustable smartphone stand provides sturdy support for all devices, making it perfect for video calls, streaming, and reading. Its compact design and portability make it ideal for travel.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Enjoy crisp, high-quality audio with this compact Bluetooth speaker. With a battery life of up to 12 hours, it's perfect for outdoor adventures and parties.

products.name: Gaming Mouse
products.description: A high-precision gaming mouse with customizable buttons, RGB lighting, and ergonomic design for long gaming sessions.

products.name: Noise-Canceling Headphones
products.description: Experience immersive sound and block out unwanted noise with these premium noise-canceling headphones. Ideal for work and travel.

products.name: Laptop Stand
products.description: Ergonomically designed laptop stand that adjusts to multiple angles for improved posture and comfort during work or gaming.

products.name: Fitness Tracker
products.description: Track your steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns with this stylish and waterproof fitness tracker.

products.name: Portable Charger
products.description: Stay powered up on the go with this compact and high-capacity portable charger. Compatible with most smartphones and tablets.

products.name: LED Desk Lamp
products.description: This sleek LED desk lamp features adjustable brightness levels and a USB port for charging your devices.

products.name: Wireless Keyboard
products.description: A sleek wireless keyboard with a slim design, responsive keys, and long-lasting battery life. Compatible with Windows, Mac, and tablets.
